pages.text: By utilizing Magic and Alchemy, substances infused with energy can be created. These are often applied industrially.

pages.title: Fluorite
pages.text: Has the property of storing Mana energy at high concentrations.$(br)At terminals that inject or release Mana, the mana conductivity is high, while contact areas other than special materials used for connections have very low mana conductivity.$(br2)Used as a Mana storage container such as a Mana Vessel.

pages.title: Mana-Charged Fluorite
pages.text: Fluorite charged with Mana energy.$(br)Can be used as a temporary supply of Mana.
